1: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <sup>3414 </sup> <n>that came to Jeremiah</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> דִּבְרֵ֖י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַבַּצָּרֽוֹת׃ <sup>1226 </sup> <n>the dearth</n>
2: אָבְלָ֣ה <sup>56 </sup> <n>mourneth</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וּשְׁעָרֶ֥יהָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>and the gates</n> אֻמְלְל֖וּ <sup>535 </sup> <n>thereof languish</n> קָדְר֣וּ <sup>6937 </sup> <n>they are black</n> לָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the ground</n> וְצִוְחַ֥ת <sup>6682 </sup> <n>and the cry</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> עָלָֽתָה׃ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>is gone up</n>
3: וְאַדִּ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>117 </sup> <n>And their nobles</n> שָׁלְח֥וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>have sent</n> [צְעֹורֵיהֶם כ] (צְעִירֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6810 </sup> <n>least</n> ק) לַמָּ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>to the waters</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they came</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> גֵּבִ֞ים <sup>1356 </sup> <n>the cisterns</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> מָ֣צְאוּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>[and] found</n> מַ֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>no water</n> שָׁ֤בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>they returned</n> כְלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>with their vessels</n> רֵיקָ֔ם <sup>7387 </sup> <n>empty</n> בֹּ֥שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>they were ashamed</n> וְהָכְלְמ֖וּ <sup>3637 </sup> <n>and confounded</n> וְחָפ֥וּ <sup>2645 </sup> <n>and covered</n> רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>their heads</n>
4: בַּעֲב֤וּר <sup>5668 </sup> <n>Because</n> הָאֲדָמָה֙ <sup>127 </sup> <n>Because the ground</n> חַ֔תָּה <sup>2865 </sup> <n>is chapt</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has been</n> גֶ֖שֶׁם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>for there was no rain</n> בָּאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> בֹּ֥שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>were ashamed</n> אִכָּרִ֖ים <sup>406 </sup> <n>the plowmen</n> חָפ֥וּ <sup>2645 </sup> <n>they covered</n> רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>their heads</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> גַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> אַיֶּ֙לֶת֙ <sup>365 </sup> <n>Yea the hind</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> יָלְדָ֖ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>also calved</n> וְעָז֑וֹב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and forsook</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is no</n> הָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> דֶּֽשֶׁא׃ <sup>1877 </sup> <n>[it] because there was no grass</n>

10: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> לָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto this people</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> כֵּ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> אָֽהֲבוּ֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>Thus have they loved</n> לָנ֔וּעַ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>to wander</n> רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>their feet</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> חָשָׂ֑כוּ <sup>2820 </sup> <n>they have not refrained</n> וַיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>therefore the LORD</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> רָצָ֔ם <sup>7521 </sup> <n>doth not accept</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> יִזְכֹּ֣ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>them he will now remember</n> עֲוֹנָ֔ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>their iniquity</n> וְיִפְקֹ֖ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and visit</n> חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>their sins</n> ס

12: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יָצֻ֗מוּ <sup>6684 </sup> <n>When they fast</n> אֵינֶ֤נִּי <sup>369 </sup> <n>I am not</n> שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>I will not hear</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> רִנָּתָ֔ם <sup>7440 </sup> <n>their cry</n> וְכִ֧י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and when</n> יַעֲל֛וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and when they offer</n> עֹלָ֥ה <sup>5930 </sup> <n>burnt offering</n> וּמִנְחָ֖ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>and an oblation</n> אֵינֶ֣נִּי <sup>369 </sup> <n>I am not</n> רֹצָ֑ם <sup>7521 </sup> <n>I will not accept</n> כִּ֗י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Rather</n> בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>them by the sword</n> וּבָרָעָ֣ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>and by the famine</n> וּבַדֶּ֔בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>and by the pestilence</n> אָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְכַלֶּ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>them but I will consume</n> אוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup> ס
